channel.title: CocoaSlideShow Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.5.4 (2 bugs fixed, 1 new feature)
item.description:
New feature

- updates with Sparkle

Bug fixes

- don't crash when setting a new default directory
- fullscreen can use any display, not only the first one

item.title: Version 0.5.5 (1 bug fixed, 4 new features)
item.description:
New features

- show thumbnails on map
- add local or remote thumbnails to KML export
- use camera rotation data
- remember user rotation

Bug fix

- fixed "check updates at startup" setting

item.title: Version 0.5.6 (2 bugs fixed, 2 new features)
item.description:
New features

- resize and export JPEGs in batch
- much better google map integration

Bug fix

- did crash on startup when default folder had more that 500 images
- thumbnails are now properly rotated on the map

item.title: Version 0.5.7 (1 bug fixed, 4 new features)
item.description:
New features

- can drag multiple files from tableview
- remember window last position
- play success sound also after export
- new 16x16 icon

Bug fix

- speed improvements

item.title: Version 0.5.8 (1 bug fixed, 3 new features, Mac OS X 10.6 required)
item.description:
New features

- display the number of flagged and unflagged images in the tableview header
- added an option to sort image names by natural order (germ...@gmail.com)

Bug fix

- application could crash when opening corrupted images

item.title: Version 0.6 (2 new features, Mac OS X 10.7 required)
item.description:
New features

- slideshow now loops by default (Brewster K.)
- code is signed for OS X 10.8 Gatekeeper
